description: Manage and execute command snippets stored in QOwnNotes notes. See also: qownnotes. More information: https://www.qownnotes.org/getting-started/command-line-snippet-manager.html.

useCases.description: Configure the snippet manager, e.g. to set the security token from QOwnNotes:
Search and print command snippets stored in your Commands.md note and all your notes tagged with commands:
Execute a snippet and show the command before executing:
Execute the last snippet and show the command before executing:
Switch between note folders in QOwnNotes:
